87a40c84f89e2462504a6456954545c2 (14:22): so, do you think can not send 2 dimensional array to php? from each row?

8c873dd996b190844ebfe7cfed2af7b7 (14:24): You can send POST data to PHP. This is a series of name/value pairs. That is all. name/value pairs. No arrays of any sort. When it gets to the server those name/value pairs can be processed by PHP (or whatever) and represented as arrays (or nested arrays) - but you can't send arrays to PHP. Just name/value pairs.
6101462cab73c6c8242ce9d4e3735245 (14:24): cybermad: you can do <input name="foo[]" />; then in php you can do: foreach ($_POST['foo'] as $val) {  echo $val; }
